detail: Bend Studio is an American video game developer located in Bend, Oregon. It was founded in 1994 as Eidetic and was purchased by Sony Computer Entertainment America in 2000. The studio is best known for developing the Syphon Filter series. Before developing Syphon Filter, they developed Bubsy 3D for the PlayStation. Bend Studio operates as a part of SCE Worldwide Studios.
